author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Sathyanarayanan (95), founder president of Salem Dharmapuri Chamber of Commerce, passed away at Palakkad on Saturday.

A technocrat, Sathyanarayanan established a glass manufacturing industry in late 1950s and was the founder secretary of the Salem Productivity Council in 1985. He served as its secretary and later as its second president.

He was also the first president of Salem Fairlands Panchayat Board and he established the Salem Fairlands Cooperative House Building Society. He played a major role in getting the Salem Steel Plant and the Salem Airport. He was a Senate Member to Periyar University.

The office-bearers of Salem Productivity Council, V. Karthikeyan, K. Mariappan, V. Sellamuthu, Ramani Gopal, N. Ashoka, S.K. Ganesan, S. Srinivasan and S. Govindan paid homage to him. His body was cremated in Salem in the evening.
title: Passes away
